abstract: The Vulcan Materials board has reiterated arguments made in court filings that the Martin Marietta Materials tender offer undervalues the company and comes at a low point for the cyclical construction business.
snippet: The Vulcan Materials board has reiterated arguments made in court filings that the Martin Marietta Materials tender offer undervalues the company and comes at a low point for the cyclical construction business.

headline.main: Vulcan Formally Rejects Martin Marietta’s Hostile Bid

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
